Bibliographic References: PP, no. 154, pi. 16 b; PPSupp, no. 197; IGD, p. 100, III.3, 41; Swaddling, The Greek Theatre, ill. on p. 15; LIMC I, p. 307, pi. 226,1.
Imagery Description: Oineus, Periboia, Diomedes and Agrios (ΑΓΡΙΟΣ), with bound hands, seated on an altar, beside which rises up a black Fury, with white wings. Below the handles: female heads.
